dateline.name:
431 Stevens st
Camden N Jersey U S America

body.p: I have to-day sent by mail my new Vol. Two Rivulets to T. C. S. and E. J. S. M. (the Scotch l's) 1 Alva st, Edinburgh—

postscript.p: have not yet sent any express parcel to London—
